name: Gorilla Taxi
description:
You are a Gorilla and drive a Taxi. Every day.

This game is a homage to times where there was no GPS, no Quest Markers, no shimmering paths to follow and no annoying companions babbling the obvious.

Only when you know the city well, when you don’t need a map, you will succeed.

The Web version is modified post jam, here is the changelog:

  • reduced needed money from $15,000 to $10,000
  • fixed a few wrongly ordered house numbers and building drawing orders
  • changed the money display to show remaining money needed instead of money earned 
  • duration to show and hide map is down to 1.2s from 2s
  • radio hint leaves after 10s automatically, instead of staying forever
  • Better hints from moles
  • slight camera movement when driving
